mapper.insert: insert into style(image1, image2, image3, content, userId, createDate) values(#{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{content}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: select s.*, u.username, u.profile, u.height, u.gender, u.age from style s inner join user as u on s.userId = u.id where s.id=#{id};
